items.title: Donors to Trump’s Transition Revealed a Year Later
items.summary: A 46-person list includes billionaires and people he went on to appoint to positions of power.

items.title: Robert L. Dear Jr., Who Killed 3 at Colorado Planned Parenthood, Dies in Prison
items.summary: Four police officers were among those wounded by Mr. Dear in his 2015 rampage when he targeted the clinic in Colorado Springs.

items.title: Missing High School Coach Travis Turner Facing Charges, Officials Say
items.summary: An Appalachian community in Virginia was electrified by its high school team’s winning streak. Until the team’s coach disappeared — and allegations against him surfaced.

items.title: Trump Administration Will Raise Prices for Foreign Tourists at National Parks
items.summary: The price increases comes as more and more international travelers are choosing to stay away from the United States and amid turmoil at the National Park Service.

items.title: Sean Duffy Wants Healthier In-Flight Snacks Along With Better-Dressed Travelers
items.summary: Sean Duffy, who has been promoting greater decorum among air travelers, said he would like to see choices besides salty pretzels and buttery cookies.

items.title: Fears About A.I. Prompt Talks of Super PACs to Rein In the Industry
items.summary: As artificial intelligence companies prepare to pour money into the midterm elections, some in the A.I. world are hatching plans of their own to curb the industry’s influence.

items.title: Hegseth orders US Navy secretary to investigate Arizona senator Mark Kelly for ‘potentially unlawful comments’ – as it happened
items.summary: <p>Donald Trump’s defense secretary sends memo to John Phelan asking him to review Kelly’s comments; House Democrats from video confirm FBI is seeking to investigate. This blog is now closed.</p><p>Senator <strong>Mark Kelly</strong> has responded to the Pentagon’s announcement that it is investigating the Arizona lawmaker for possible breaches of military law after he joined five other Democratic members of Congress in a video calling for US troops to refuse illegal orders.</p><p>“I said something that was pretty simple and non controversial, and that was that members of the military should follow the law,” Kelly said in an MS NOW interview with Rachel on Monday. “And in response to that, Donald Trump said I should be executed.”</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/nov/25/us-politics-pam-bondi-appeal-james-comey-letitia-james-cases-donald-trump-venezuela-latest-updates">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Minnesotans gear up to fight Trump ending Somalis’ temporary protected status
items.summary: <p>Though president’s order is legally questionable, advocates worry community could be targeted for immigration raids</p><p>In the days since the president said he would be ending a legal immigration status program for Somalis in Minnesota, local elected officials and community members said they will fight back.</p><p>On Truth Social on Friday, Trump wrote that he would be “terminating, effective immediately” temporary protected status for Somalis in Minnesota. Trump wrote that Minnesota was a “hub of fraudulent money laundering activity”. “Send them back to where they came from. It’s OVER!” he wrote.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/nov/25/minnesota-fight-trump-somalis-tps-order">Continue reading...</a>
